name: Summertime Sadness
description:
controls:

wasd to walking around, left click to interact 

0 to change window resolution, 9 to fullscreen

esc to quit

__________

The game is based on some of my other games and my friends’ games (this for example). Also, Lovecraft inspired.

I used assets of Open World Demo Collection by Epic Games and some free 3d-models. Characters models was made in Mixamo Fuse. Also, I used some public domain licensed sounds of freesound.org.
